otherNightReminder: Each night, wake the Martyr. They pick two players, If either chosen player would cause a death tonight, the Martyr dies instead.
name: Martyr
ability: Each Night*, select two players: if either characterâ€™s ability would cause a death tonight, you die instead. If executed, you might not die.

otherNightReminder: On the second night, wake the Skulker and have them select their alignment. Wake a player and tell them of the choice.
name: Skulker
ability: You register as evil, but are good. On your second night, chose your alignment. A player learns of your choice.

firstNightReminder: Each night, select a player. This player is chosen.
name: Siphon
ability: Each night, select a player: if they are executed tomorrow, the Demon learns their ability, and may choose to adopt it alongside their own. The Demon may only have one adopted ability at a time.
